features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication system with staff/customer login, password reset, and two-factor authentication

features.name: Routing System
features.description: Hash-based routing with lazy loading and protected routes

features.name: Internationalization
features.description: Bilingual support (Spanish/English) with context-based language switching

features.name: Package Management
features.description: Package intake, tracking, and delivery management system

features.name: Customer Management
features.description: Customer directory, mailbox management, and customer portal

features.name: Dashboard & Analytics
features.description: Main dashboard with statistics, analytics, and reporting

features.name: Device Management
features.description: IoT device tracking, mobile device management, and asset tracking

features.name: Maps & Location
features.description: Google Maps integration, live tracking, and route optimization

features.name: Billing & Invoicing
features.description: Automated billing, invoice generation, and financial reporting

features.name: Employee Management
features.description: Employee tracking, payroll management, and performance monitoring

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Inventory tracking, analytics, and management system

features.name: Last Mile Delivery
features.description: Delivery optimization, partnerships, and customer communication

features.name: Notifications System
features.description: Real-time notifications, alerts, and communication system

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Global error boundaries, route error handling, and graceful degradation

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Database integration, authentication, and edge functions

features.name: PWA Features
features.description: Progressive Web App with offline capabilities and service worker

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS

features.name: Testing Framework
features.description: Playwright end-to-end testing and component testing

features.name: Performance Optimization
features.description: Code splitting, lazy loading, and performance optimizations

features.name: Security Features
features.description: Security monitoring, audit logs, and compliance features
